vista.graph
Interface AnimationObserver

All Known Implementing Classes:
AnimateElement, AnimatorCanvas, BarElement, ChannelElement, FluxElement, ParticleElement, PieChartAnimator, ProfilePlotAnimator, PTMAnimator, PTMDualAnimator, TimeDisplayElement
public interface AnimationObserver

A element that needs to be an observer needs to implement this interface
